desc: Bonny is a 100% natural, plant-based fiber powder supplement that tastes amazing & contains adaptogens to beat stressors. Vegan, no gluten, prebiotic & fruit-flavored, never artificial. Fiber blend of psyllium husk & inulin for better poops. Fight constipation, hemorrhoids, diverticulosis, & more w/ a high fiber diet.

layout.text: Fiber That Tastes Amazing & Makes You Poop
All-natural, plant-based, fiber supplements for pleasant poops. Fruit-flavored fiber that tastes amazing. Say bye to bathroom issues today.
